TopicTitle: Saitek X-55 Rhino Compatibility with Unity5?

Articles.Content:
Does anyone know if we might have better luck using the Saitek X-55 (or other complex controllers) in KSP with the new Unity 5 upgrade? In the past, KSP recognized the separate stick and throttle as the same device, forcing users to have to go through remapping software, with various levels of success. 

The X-55 has a lot of HAT switches and other obscure controls not found on typical joysticks, so support can be tricky. For instance, it would be interesting to program two hat switches or a hat switch and a rocker to use for Translational RCS control (6 discrete inputs). 

Thanks!

Jon
